Text: RE ETS SAP Security Access Review MeetingTracy We still have not had a response from you on the roles assigned below Please let me know if we should be contacting someone else or if this is no longer your responsibility Our security audit has begun and the auditors are requesting documentation on the signoff from the business units If you have any questions please let me know Thank you Danette Original Appointment From Campbell Danette On Behalf Of Andrade Juanita Sent Monday August PM To Geaccone Tracy Subject FW ETS SAP Security Access Review Meeting When Monday August PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ACC Tracy Per our meeting today we are preparing for an internal security audit that will start next week Please review the list of attached users for the IM roles that you are the security owner for Please let me know of any changes that need to be made and any questions that you may have It is important that I recieve your response before the end of the day on Thursday August Thank you Danette Original Appointment From Andrade Juanita Sent Thursday August PM To Campbell Danette Bayles Timothy Geaccone Tracy Zahn Gary Walters Jr Harry Cherry Paul Brasher Barney DickensWilson Shirley Jo McEllin David Cobb Jr John Sheffield Sandy Cc Sandy CT Subject ETS SAP Security Access Review Meeting When Monday August PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ACC This meeting will be to discuss the SAP SECURITY ACCESS REVIEW report that was sent to you the week of August In order to comply with auditing standards a positive confirmation is needed from the security owner for the annual review This meeting has been setup to obtain security owner approval for the roles assigned since no written response or confirmation has been recieved File ETSxls Attendees Timothy Bayles Tracy Geaccone Gary Zahn Harry Walters Jr Paul Cherry Barney Brasher Shirley Jo DickensWilson David McEllin John Cobb optional Mary Sloan optional Danette Campbell Chairperson Mtgsetup by JAndrade
